snippet: The Smithsonian Institution is allowing members of the public to help decipher thousands of digitized pages that cannot be easily read by a computer.
abstract: The Smithsonian Institution is allowing members of the public to help decipher thousands of digitized pages that cannot be easily read by a computer.

headline.main: Smithsonian Turning to the Public to Help Transcribe Documents
headline.print_headline: Smithsonian Asks Public for Transcription Help
